content.content: just wondering . seems impossible to come up with a solution on the spot

Such thing become into my mind when I read the description first time. Then you need to split the solution into steps/phase and it becomes clear.

1. find positions of tags in string
2. merge all overlap positions
3. build the result according to positions from step #2

Should be this task marked as 'Hard'? 
From my point of view it's combination of several 'Medium' level problems, but it's a lot of code to write for the full task.
Very involved and a lot of test cases for a medium. Not too bad though I don\'t think.
